target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002590_ALISAIE<tab>Warum nur<var 1D /var>...? Warum?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Safer to brave the wilds than trust in our magic.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Sie hatten mehr Angst vor uns als vor den wilden Tieren<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002610_ALPHINAUD<tab>We should've... I should've...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002610_ALPHINAUD<tab>Das ist alles meine Schuld<var 1D /var>... Ich<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002620_ALPHINAUD<tab>We can't leave them like this. We have to take them home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002620_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hilfst du uns dabei, die beiden zu<var 16 /var>rück<var 16 /var>zu<var 16 /var>brin<var 16 /var>gen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002630_ALISAIE<tab>What if we're only making it worse?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002630_ALISAIE<tab>Wie viele Unschuldige müssen wir noch begraben?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002640_ALPHINAUD<tab>Maybe we don't belong here. But neither do they. Not out here in the wind and the cold.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002640_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich ... Ich weiß auch nicht<var 1D /var>... Aber wir können sie nicht hier in der Kälte lassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002650_ALPHINAUD<tab>I heard the story. About Varis's voice. From beyond the grave...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002650_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich habe von diesen Geräten gehört. Angeblich erklingt daraus manchmal Varis' Stimme<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002660_ALPHINAUD<tab>Of course, I didn't believe it. But Licinia and her sister did. Perhaps there is something to the tale after all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002660_ALPHINAUD<tab>Das ist natürlich unmöglich. Aber trotzdem war der Apparat für die Schwestern wichtig genug, um ihn auf ihrer Flucht mitzunehmen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002670_ALPHINAUD<tab>I want to understand. So I'm going to borrow this for a while. If that's all right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002670_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich borge ihn mir für eine Weile aus, wenn ihr erlaubt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002680_ALPHINAUD<tab>You had every reason not to trust us. We came as trespassers. Invaders.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002680_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich werde nie die Angst in euren Augen vergessen, als ihr uns gesehen habt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002690_ALPHINAUD<tab>But I pray that, in time, we will be more than that to you. That we will find a way to help your loved ones...and see that no more children are left to freeze alone in the snow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002690_ALPHINAUD<tab>Aber wir sind hier, um euch zu helfen. Um etwas Wärme in diese kalte Welt zu bringen. Ich hoffe, das könnt ihr irgendwann verstehen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002700_LUCIA<tab>Thank you for your report.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002700_LUCIA<tab>Danke für euren Bericht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002710_LUCIA<tab>We shall inform the troops of these developments, and instruct them to proceed with the utmost caution should they encounter any survivors.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002710_LUCIA<tab>Wir werden diese Erkenntnisse mit allen teilen, damit sich so etwas nicht wiederholt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002720_MAXIMA<tab>Allow me to go and speak with the ones at the Victors' Spoils. They may be more willing to listen to a fellow Garlean and accept our offer of assistance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002720_MAXIMA<tab>Was die Überlebenden in Siegers Lohn angeht, werde ich persönlich den Kontakt suchen. Einem Garlear gegenüber sind sie hoffentlich weniger verschlossen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002730_ALPHINAUD<tab>I pray you are right. And though I am loath to burden you any further, should there be an appropriate occasion to speak of Licinia and her sister...please do so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002730_ALPHINAUD<tab>Danke. Wenn sich die Gelegenheit ergibt, ihnen von den Schwestern zu berichten, dann tue es. Wir wollen es keinesfalls vertuschen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002740_LUCIA<tab>I am sorry to have put you through this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002740_LUCIA<tab>Es tut mir leid, dass ihr das durchmachen musstet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002750_ALISAIE<tab>My distress is nothing compared to their suffering...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002750_ALISAIE<tab>Ich hätte nicht gezögert, mein Leben für das der zwei Mädchen zu geben<var 1D /var>... Aber dafür ist es jetzt zu spät.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002760_ALISAIE<tab>So tell me: what else have we learned?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002760_ALISAIE<tab>Lasst uns alles tun, damit so etwas nicht noch einmal passiert<var 1D /var>... Aber sagt, wie stehen die Dinge sonst?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002770_YSHTOLA<tab>As you may have already heard, we have succeeded in curing the members of the Populares Maxima identified.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002770_YSHTOLA<tab>Wir haben tatsächlich gute Neuigkeiten. Ich hatte es Lucia gerade berichtet, aber es ist uns gelungen, die besessenen Popularen zu heilen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002780_YSHTOLA<tab>They have provided us with some intriguing insights into the current state of Garlemald.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002780_YSHTOLA<tab>Ihre Berichte über die Geschehnisse in der Hauptstadt waren äußerst aufschlussreich<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002790_YSHTOLA<tab>The assassination of Emperor Varis was the catalyst for the civil war. Nerva declared his claim to the throne, and his opponents refused to recognize it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002790_YSHTOLA<tab>Wie ihr ja wisst, brach nach dem plötzlichen Tod von Kaiser Varis ein Bürgerkrieg um dessen Nachfolge aus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002800_YSHTOLA<tab>Fighting broke out in the capital, where Nerva's IIIrd Legion clashed with the Ist, who remained loyal to Varis even after his death.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002800_YSHTOLA<tab>Nerva führte seine III. Legion gegen die I. Legion, welche Varis über seinen Tod hinaus Treue hielt. Ihr Schlachtfeld: Die Kaiserstadt selbst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002810_ARUHNSENNA<tab>Of course, even imperial warmongers would balk at the idea of turning their shining city into a battleground. Like burning down the wood to spite the wasps. Neither side would be so mad.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002810_ARUHNSENNA<tab>Dass sie bereit sind, die Straßen ihrer Hauptstadt in Blut zu tränken, zeigt, wie unversöhnlich sie sich gegen<var 16 /var>über<var 16 /var>stehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002820_ARUHNSENNA<tab>Unless something or <var 1A 02 /var>someone<var 1A 01 /var> inflamed their animosity to such an extent that they could not help but act against their better judgment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002820_ARUHNSENNA<tab>Den Parteien reichte jeder noch so kleine Grund, um mit loderndem Hass aufeinander loszugehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002830_LUCIA<tab>It brings to mind events at the Ghimlyt Dark, does it not? The Emperor's sudden withdrawal from the front lines, specifically.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002830_LUCIA<tab>Erinnerst du dich an die Schlacht in der Ghimlyt-Finsternis? Wie Kaiser Varis sich plötzlich von der Front zurückzog?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002840_LUCIA<tab>Nerva and his father, Titus─Varis's then political rival─took advantage of rumors that Crown Prince Zenos had been possessed by a demon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002840_LUCIA<tab>Für Varis' politische Gegner Titus und dessen Sohn Nerva waren die Gerüchte, dass Zenos von einem Dämon besessen sei, ein gefundenes Fressen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002850_ALISAIE<tab>Elidibus. What better way to disparage your enemies than with the truth─or a close enough approximation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002850_ALISAIE<tab>Gerüchte, die in ihrem Kern wahr waren. Wir hatten damals lediglich ausgenutzt, dass Elidibus seine Hand im Spiel hatte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002860_LUCIA<tab>Indeed. But before their accusations could be substantiated, many of Titus's followers were silenced.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002860_LUCIA<tab>Ja. Titus und seinen Anhängern gelang es jedoch nicht, bis zur Wahrheit vorzudringen, und Varis konnte einen Putschversuch abwenden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002870_LUCIA<tab>While some were merely stripped of their status, others died under curious circumstances. One after another, suddenly and suspiciously.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002870_LUCIA<tab>Dabei wurden die Hauptakteure der Gegenseite der Reihe nach zum Schweigen gebracht. Entweder, indem man sie strafversetzte - oder für immer aus dem Weg räumte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002880_YSHTOLA<tab>Again, Elidibus. Like as not, he had a hand in it. No evidence was found to implicate Varis, certainly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002880_YSHTOLA<tab>Vermutlich Elidibus' Werk. Zumindest gibt es keine Beweise, dass Kaiser Varis direkt involviert war.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002890_YSHTOLA<tab>Nevertheless, Titus, Nerva, and the IIIrd Legion would have judged it a brazen attempt by the Emperor to rid himself of his political enemies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002890_YSHTOLA<tab>Unbestritten war er aber der größte Nutznießer der Ereignisse. Ohne die III. Legion hatten Titus und Nerva niemanden mehr, der ihnen den Rücken stärkte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002900_YSHTOLA<tab>And then, in the midst of this growing turmoil, Varis zos Galvus is murdered...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002900_YSHTOLA<tab>Und während seine Erzfeinde vor Wut noch tobten, wurde der Kaiser schließlich ermordet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002910_YSHTOLA<tab>And Garlemald's own prodigal son, Gaius van Baelsar, is named the murderer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002910_YSHTOLA<tab>Man hielt Gaius für den Mörder.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>Shortly thereafter, Nerva claims the right of succession, and in response, the Ist Legion claims the assassination was part of a coup d'état orchestrated by Titus and Nerva.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>Da Nerva direkt im Anschluss Anspruch auf den Thron erhob, vermutete die I. Legion hinter dem Ganzen einen Putsch der Titus-Fraktion.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002930_ALPHINAUD<tab>So no one is at fault and everyone else is to blame.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002930_ALPHINAUD<tab>Die Lager beschuldigten sich gegenseitig, Urheber des Konflikts zu sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002940_MAXIMA<tab>I should add that both parties received substantial financial backing─presumably to provide them with the means and encouragement to pursue a swift victory─and that these contributions came from the selfsame benefactor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002940_MAXIMA<tab>Und jetzt wird's interessant. Beide Seiten erhielten nämlich just zu jener Zeit große finanzielle Zuwendungen, die ihnen Hoffnungen auf einen schnellen Sieg machten. Aus derselben Hand.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002950_ALISAIE<tab>I'd heard House Brutus had been filling the IIIrd Legion's coffers, but the Ist as well?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002950_ALISAIE<tab>Die III. Legion erhielt angeblich Geld von der Familie Brutus. Die I. also auch?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002960_MAXIMA<tab>It would seem so. Though the Populares determined that the Ist Legion received funds from a variety of organizations, all had connections to House Brutus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002960_MAXIMA<tab>Allerdings! Das Geld kam laut den Popularen zwar aus verschiedenen Kanälen, aber alle gehen auf die Brutus zurück.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002970_ALPHINAUD<tab>So Fandaniel, in the guise of Asahi, was playing both sides against each other the entire time!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002970_ALPHINAUD<tab>Fandaniel! In Gestalt von Asahi hat er also beide Seiten angestachelt?!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002980_MAXIMA<tab>The information we gained from my friends does not end there. One night shortly after fighting broke out, the capital was shaken by an immense tremor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002980_MAXIMA<tab>Es sieht ganz so aus. Und das ist noch nicht alles. Wie die Popularen berichten, kam es eines Nachts kurz nach Ausbruch der Kämpfe zu einer starken Erschütterung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002990_MAXIMA<tab>From that point onward, they have no memories─no recollection of any events, including our clash on the Magna Glacies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_002990_MAXIMA<tab>Danach sind all ihre Erinnerungen ausgelöscht. Selbst vom Kampf mit uns in Magna Glacies wussten sie nichts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003000_MAXIMA<tab>But when asked about the imperial palace and its bizarre transformation, they somehow recall Emperor Varis giving them orders. In their dreams.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003000_MAXIMA<tab>Einzig der Umbau des Kaiserpalastes soll ihnen von Varis befohlen worden sein. In einem Traum habe er ihnen immer und immer wieder die gleiche Botschaft eingeschärft<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003010_MAXIMA<tab>“May the Tower of Babil stand as testament to the glory of Garlemald!”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003010_MAXIMA<tab>„Die ganze Welt soll in Garlemalds Herrlichkeit erstrahlen. Der Turm von Babil wird unser Licht zu allen Völkern tragen!“, hat er angeblich gesagt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003020_ALISAIE<tab>This sounds awfully familiar...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003020_ALISAIE<tab>Das alles klingt ziemlich vertraut<var 1D /var>...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003030_ALPHINAUD<tab>We have something to show you all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Es gibt da etwas, das ihr unbedingt sehen müsst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003040_MAXIMA<tab>Varis spoke to them through this radio...? Perhaps it was a recording, but if not, that would be...inexplicable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003040_MAXIMA<tab>Daraus ist Varis' Stimme erklungen? Wie seltsam<var 1D /var>... Wenn es keine Aufnahme war, was war es dann?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003050_YSHTOLA<tab>We are of one mind, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003050_YSHTOLA<tab>Denkst du auch, was ich denke?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003060_ARUHNSENNA<tab>The aether that permeates the ore used in this device is almost identical to that of the talismans.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003060_ARUHNSENNA<tab>Der Äther, der durch das Metall in diesem Apparat fließt, weist verblüffende Ähnlichkeiten zu unseren Talismanen auf.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003070_YSHTOLA<tab>I see it... While it is likely more by coincidence than design, these devices might also ward against a primal's influence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003070_YSHTOLA<tab>Das sehe ich ebenso. Könnte es sein, dass diese Geräte durch eine Laune des Schicksals vor dem Einfluss der Primae schützen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003080_YSHTOLA<tab>A picture is beginning to form. If the tremor felt throughout Garlemald was a wave of aether emitted by a primal...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003080_YSHTOLA<tab>Wenn dem so wäre, dann könnte es eine Verbindung geben. Mal angenommen, die nächtliche Erschütterung in Garlemald wurde von einem Ätherimpuls ausgelöst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003090_YSHTOLA<tab>...Then while those within range would have been tempered, those huddled around a radio─desperate for news concerning the civil war─would have been spared.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003090_YSHTOLA<tab>In diesem Fall wäre ein Großteil der Bevölkerung zu Besessenen geworden<var 1D /var>... aber alle, die den Kriegsnachrichten lauschten, wären wie durch ein Wunder verschont geblieben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003100_ALPHINAUD<tab>No wonder Licinia kept it close...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003100_ALPHINAUD<tab>Deswegen hatten Licina und ihre Schwester es also dabei<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003110_CIRINA<tab>My friends! I must speak with you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003110_CIRINA<tab>Entschuldigt bitte, dass ich euch unterbreche.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003120_CIRINA<tab>A young man was caught trying to steal our supplies. He is a soldier of the ironmen, we think, but one who has not been made thrall.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003120_CIRINA<tab>Wir haben im Lager jemanden entdeckt, der sich an unserem Gepäck zu schaffen machte. Sieht aus wie ein garleischer Soldat, allerdings scheint er nicht besessen zu sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003130_CIRINA<tab>Thankfully, Magnai restrained him before blood was spilled. The stranger is outside, if you wish to ask him questions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003130_CIRINA<tab>Zum Glück konnte Magnai ihn niederringen, bevor Blut vergossen wurde. Wir haben ihn hergebracht. Wollt ihr ihn vernehmen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003140_ALPHINAUD<tab>I think we do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Das sollten wir!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003150_LUCIA<tab>Who do we have here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003150_LUCIA<tab>Wen haben wir denn da<var 1D /var>...?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003160_JULLUS<tab>(-???-)Garleans!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003160_JULLUS<tab>(-???-)Ihr seid ja Garlear!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003170_JULLUS<tab>(-???-)Traitors to your homeland! Have you no shame!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003170_JULLUS<tab>(-???-)Verräter! Habt ihr denn keinen Stolz?!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003180_LUCIA<tab>I am Lucia Junius, a Temple Knight of Ishgard. And you are?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003180_LUCIA<tab>Mein Name ist Lucia Junius, ich bin eine Tempelritterin Ishgards. Und wer bist du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003190_JULLUS<tab>Jullus pyr Norbanus. And that's all you invaders will get from me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003190_JULLUS<tab>Jullus pyr Norbanus. Und mehr werdet ihr nicht aus mir herausbekommen, elende Invasoren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003200_LUCIA<tab>We are not here to invade Garlemald. Far from it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003200_LUCIA<tab>Wir sind nicht hier, um dir dein Land zu nehmen, Jullus. Ganz im Gegenteil.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003210_LUCIA<tab>Like you, our allies in Eorzea and the Far East fight in defense of their lives and their loved ones, even as we speak.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003210_LUCIA<tab>Wir sind hier, um das Chaos zu bekämpfen, das die Telophoroi über die Welt gebracht haben. So wie ihr auch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003220_LUCIA<tab>But it is the people of Garlemald who have suffered most. This we know. And that is why we have come to offer you our aid, that we may unite against our common foe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003220_LUCIA<tab>Wir wissen, dass die Bevölkerung von Garlemald besonders viel Leid ertragen musste. Deshalb sind wir hier, um euch die Hand in Freund<var 16 /var>schaft zu reichen und euch unsere Unterstützung anzubieten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003230_LUCIA<tab>Whether you believe me or not, those are the facts. Now, answer me this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003230_LUCIA<tab>Ich erwarte nicht, dass du uns mit offenen Armen empfängst. Aber beantworte mir folgende Frage<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003240_LUCIA<tab>Why would a proud soldier of the Empire be reduced to stealing? The situation must be dire indeed for you to go to such lengths.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003240_LUCIA<tab>Wie kann es sein, dass ein stolzer Soldat des großen Garleischen Kaiserreichs unser Gepäck durchwühlt wie ein lumpiger Dieb? Gib es zu: Du kannst etwas Hilfe gebrauchen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003250_JULLUS<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003250_JULLUS<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003260_LUCIA<tab>If it is supplies you seek, we would gladly share ours. Or turn a blind eye while you leave with your “spoils.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003260_LUCIA<tab>Wenn du etwas benötigst, dann sag es einfach. Du kannst später gerne behaupten, wir hätten es dir aufgedrängt. Oder meinetwegen auch, du hättest es uns gestohlen. Das ist mir egal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003270_JULLUS<tab>I will not negotiate. My commander will determine how to deal with you and yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003270_JULLUS<tab>Ich bin nicht befugt zu entscheiden, wie wir mit euch zu verfahren haben. Das kann einzig mein Kommandant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003280_JULLUS<tab>If you wish to treat with him, I will take you. But no more than three.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003280_JULLUS<tab>Wenn ihr wollt, kann ich euch zu ihm führen. Aber höchstens drei von euch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003290_YSHTOLA<tab>I don't much like the sound of that, but if we do accept his proposal, I suggest the two of us and...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003290_YSHTOLA<tab>Was meinst du? Falls wir zustimmen, gehen wohl besser du und ich<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003300_ALPHINAUD<tab>Please allow me and Alisaie to act as envoys.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003300_ALPHINAUD<tab>Meine Schwester und ich werden das Korps repräsentieren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003310_YSHTOLA<tab>May I ask why?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003310_YSHTOLA<tab>Und warum, wenn ich fragen darf?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003320_ALPHINAUD<tab>We have seen with our own eyes the hardships the Garleans face. How their futures and lives hang in the balance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003320_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wir haben das Leid der Garlear mit eigenen Augen gesehen. Ihre Zukunft, ihre Leben, das alles hängt am seidenen Faden. Es ist mir das Risiko wert.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003330_ALISAIE<tab>It's not the warmest invitation, but it's an opportunity to prove our intentions true. Maybe not a chance to make things right, but a chance to...make them better.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003330_ALISAIE<tab>Es wäre eine Chance, unsere guten Absichten zu demonstrieren. Und für vergangene Fehler einzustehen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm going with you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich werde euch begleiten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What would your mother say if I let you two go by yourselves?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Eure Mutter würde mir niemals verzeihen, wenn ich euch allein ziehen ließe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003340_LUCIA<tab>I can see that persuading you otherwise is a lost cause. But you will proceed with the utmost care.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003340_LUCIA<tab>Wenn dies euer Wunsch ist, werde ich nicht widersprechen. Passt bitte gut auf euch auf.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003350_JULLUS<tab>A couple of children and what─a sellsword? Is this an insult?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003350_JULLUS<tab>Zwei Kinder und <var 08 E905 ((ihre Aufpasserin)) ((ihr Aufpasser)) /var>? Ihr nehmt uns wohl nicht für voll, was?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003360_LUCIA<tab>Not in the least. You will find that they are more than qualified to speak on our behalf.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003360_LUCIA<tab>Du solltest nicht von dir auf andere schließen. Die drei sind mehr als würdig, uns zu vertreten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003370_JULLUS<tab>There are many dangers on the road ahead. I will need that back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003370_JULLUS<tab>Der Weg zu unserem Stützpunt ist gefährlich. Ich werde meine Waffe brauchen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003380_JULLUS<tab>...These are their chosen representatives.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003380_JULLUS<tab>... Also habe ich drei ihrer Vertreter mitgebracht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003390_QUINTUS<tab>(-Imposing Commander-)Very well. Let us hear what they have to say.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003390_QUINTUS<tab>(-Würdevoller General-)Hört, hört. Dann stell uns doch bitte mal vor.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003400_JULLUS<tab>Yes sir!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003400_JULLUS<tab>Zu Befehl!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003410_JULLUS<tab>I present to you our commander...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003410_JULLUS<tab>Dies ist unser Kommandant<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003420_JULLUS<tab>...Lord Quintus van Cinna, legatus of the Ist Legion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003420_JULLUS<tab>Quintus van Cinna, Legatus der glorreichen I. Legion.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003430_ALPHINAUD<tab>The Ist? I had no idea you had survived!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003430_ALPHINAUD<tab>Die I. Legion?! Sie besteht also noch?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003440_QUINTUS<tab>We lost our Emperor, our city, more than half our troops. For my wounds, I may never take the field again. But we survived, aye.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003440_QUINTUS<tab>Wir haben Kaiser, Hauptstadt und einen Großteil unserer Kameraden verloren. Und mein einst starker Körper ist ebenfalls nur noch ein Schatten seiner selbst<var 1D /var>... Bestehen würde ich das nicht nennen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003450_QUINTUS<tab>In a manner much to your liking, I daresay.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003450_QUINTUS<tab>Euch ist das aber sicher nur recht, nehme ich an.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003460_ALPHINAUD<tab>We have no intention of adding to your misfortunes. Nor do we bear you any ill will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003460_ALPHINAUD<tab>Das Leid, das Ihr ertragen musstet, bringt uns keinerlei Genugtuung. Wir sind nicht in feindlichen Absichten hier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003470_QUINTUS<tab>Spare me. Though you children may speak in earnest, overtures of peace ever ring hollow in my ears. So long as man stands to profit from his neighbor's suffering, war is inevitable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003470_QUINTUS<tab>Pah! Spar mir die leeren Beteuerungen. Ich weiß gut genug, dass es zwischen Feinden kein Mitleid geben kann.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003480_QUINTUS<tab>Driven from our ancestral homeland into this blasted waste. Yet still you yearned to rob us of our paltry scraps.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003480_QUINTUS<tab>Wir haben es viel zu oft erfahren. Erst hat man uns aus unserer gepriesenen Heimat vertrieben - und dann war uns selbst hier unser kärgliches Glück nicht vergönnt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003490_QUINTUS<tab>'Twas only with magitek that you learned to keep your distance. Though we knew it was only a matter of time before you regrouped and returned.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003490_QUINTUS<tab>Wir schufen die Magitek-Waffen, doch zur Abschreckung reichten sie nicht. Als der Feind uns zu überrennen drohte, mussten wir sie einsetzen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003500_QUINTUS<tab>Conquest and empire were our only defenses. Emperors Solus and Varis understood this, and through their campaigns saw us grow and prosper. Much blood has been spilled in Garlemald's name, aye, but if it is a choice between yours and mine, then it is hardly a choice at all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003500_QUINTUS<tab>Und so sahen unsere Kaiser - erst Solus und später auch Varis - ihr Heil stets nur in der Flucht nach vorn. Ein größeres, ein stärkeres Reich sollte uns schützen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003510_ALPHINAUD<tab>I do not deny that a great many conflicts throughout history were driven by the desire─or necessity─to gain by another's loss. That is not why we are here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003510_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich kann nicht abstreiten, dass unsere Geschichte seit jeher von Konflikten gekennzeichnet ist. Und dennoch hat sich mir wiederholt gezeigt, dass hinter den Zielen eines jeden Volkes mehr steckt als bloßes Selbstinteresse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nor have we come to petition your aid in the war with the Telophoroi, grave though that threat may be. Our purpose is simply this:
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Natürlich wären wir froh, den Telophoroi gemeinsam mit Eurer kampferprobten Truppe trotzen zu dürfen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003530_ALPHINAUD<tab>We wish to help you. Let us help you. If there is aught that can be done to ease your plight, we would be glad to do it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Aber mehr noch als das treibt uns der Wunsch, Euch zu helfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003540_QUINTUS<tab>Perhaps you would.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003540_QUINTUS<tab>Das glaube ich dir sogar.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003550_QUINTUS<tab>But regardless of the ideals you espouse, your leaders would not send an army into Garlemald if they did not stand to benefit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003550_QUINTUS<tab>Doch wie hehr eure Ideale auch sein mögen, eure Anführer hätten wohl kaum ein ganzes Regiment nach Garlemald geschickt, wenn sie sich nicht einen Nutzen davon versprächen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003560_QUINTUS<tab>If we accept their aid, they will expect their efforts to be rewarded once the Telophoroi are no longer a threat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003560_QUINTUS<tab>Mal angenommen, wir nähmen euer Angebot an<var 1D /var>... Man würde sicher einen Ausgleich fordern, sobald die Gefahr gebannt ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003570_QUINTUS<tab>And after compensation and concessions, the great Empire would be brought to heel. Her enemies rejoice at her downfall. Our third eye a mark of shame.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003570_QUINTUS<tab>Wieder einmal würden die Garlear ihre Freiheit verlieren. Das dritte Auge, Stolz unseres Volkes, würde verkommen zu einem Mal der Knecht<var 16 /var>schaft.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003580_ALISAIE<tab>We won't stand idly by and let your people be humiliated─and we're not alone in that. We only want to make a difference─to make this world of ours better. Surely you can understand that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003580_ALISAIE<tab>Niemand wird Euch Eure Ehre nehmen. Wir sind hier, weil wir eine bessere Welt schaffen wollen, in der alle in Frieden leben können.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003590_ALISAIE<tab>What I'm trying to say is...there are so, so many people who just don't care about making you suffer. And maybe that's almost insulting after all the suffering you feel the world has subjected your people to, but...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003590_ALISAIE<tab>Wenn mich die Freunde, die uns auf unseren Reisen begegnet sind, eines gelehrt haben, dann ist es, dass man niemals die Hoffnung aufgeben darf. Für Euch mag das wie blauäugiger Unfug klingen, aber mich treibt es an.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003600_ALISAIE<tab>Believe it or not, that's the truth. And now we're here, and all we're asking is for you to tell us what you want. What you hope for.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003600_ALISAIE<tab>Misstraut mir, wenn Ihr wollt. Aber verratet mir wenigstens, was Ihr Euch erhofft.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003610_ALPHINAUD<tab>So much blood has been shed. So much lost. All because of this endless war. Who wouldn't want to end it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003610_ALPHINAUD<tab>Der Konflikt zwischen Garlemald und Eorzea hat unendlich viel Leid gebracht. Ist es wirklich so seltsam, ihn beenden zu wollen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003620_ALPHINAUD<tab>Can we not work together, to face our problems as one?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003620_ALPHINAUD<tab>Was spricht dagegen, unsere Probleme gemeinsam zu bewältigen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003630_QUINTUS<tab>Answer me this, young peacemakers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003630_QUINTUS<tab>Lasst mich euch mal was fragen, ihr Idealisten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003640_QUINTUS<tab>If a world without conflict is your desire, why reject the unity and prosperity of Garlemald?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003640_QUINTUS<tab>Wenn ihr euch wirklich so sehr nach Frieden sehnt, warum habt ihr euch Garlemald dann in den Weg gestellt, als es versucht hat, die Welt zu vereinen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003650_QUINTUS<tab>Is it because we do not share your faith?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003650_QUINTUS<tab>Weil wir nicht an eure Götter glauben?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003660_QUINTUS<tab>That we do not share your heritage?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003660_QUINTUS<tab>Weil wir anders aussehen als ihr?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003670_QUINTUS<tab>That our ideals and virtues differ? That we cherish and hold in the highest that which you do not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003670_QUINTUS<tab>Oder andere Ideale und Vorlieben haben?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003680_QUINTUS<tab>Disparity is the root of discord, and peace built on compromise is flawed and fleeting. Happiness for one and all is a dream, and the reality is that to the victor go the spoils.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003680_QUINTUS<tab>Auch wir würden niemals freiwillig das aufgeben, woran wir glauben. Und ein Frieden, der auf einem solchen Opfer aufbaut, hätte ohnehin keinen Bestand.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003690_QUINTUS<tab>That is why we Garleans will never submit nor surrender. For freedom and for pride, we will remain true to ourselves until the bitter end. That is my hope.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003690_QUINTUS<tab>Aus diesem Grund werden wir bis zum Schluss dafür kämpfen, unsere Freiheit und unseren Stolz zu bewahren. Das erhoffe ich mir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003700_QUINTUS<tab>It seems there is nothing more to say on the matter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003700_QUINTUS<tab>Ich denke, unser Gespräch ist hiermit beendet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003710_QUINTUS<tab>You will remain here while I decide what is to be done with you. Do not be alarmed. No harm will come to you─if you cooperate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003710_QUINTUS<tab>Keine Angst. Es liegt mir fern, willkürlich Opfer zu fordern. Doch bis ich entschieden habe, was zu tun ist, werdet ihr bei uns bleiben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003720_ALPHINAUD<tab>We will not resist. However, as your “guests,” I ask that we be allowed to speak with the other members of your group.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003720_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wir werden keine Gegenwehr leisten. Doch erlaubt uns bitte, uns frei bei Euch zu bewegen und mit allen zu reden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003730_QUINTUS<tab>As you wish. I had no intention of locking you up, as by dawn you would be frozen stiff, and you are no good to me dead. You are free to move about the encampment. But there is one condition.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003730_QUINTUS<tab>Nur zu. In eine Zelle wollte ich euch ohnehin nicht werfen, denn da wärt ihr alsbald steifgefroren. Und tot nützt ihr mir nichts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003740_QUINTUS<tab>Collar them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003740_QUINTUS<tab>Legt ihnen die Halszwingen an.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003750_ALPHINAUD<tab>What are these...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003750_ALPHINAUD<tab>Was ist das?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003760_QUINTUS<tab>Incentive. You will be watched at all times. Stray too far or act suspiciously and we will administer a rather painful shock.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003760_QUINTUS<tab>Nur ein Anreiz, euch von eurer besten Seite zu zeigen. Aber passt auf, Fehlverhalten könnte schmerzhafte Konsequenzen haben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003770_QUINTUS<tab>Stop. Keep away from that one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003770_QUINTUS<tab>Nein. Bei <var 08 E905 ((der)) ((dem)) /var> wäre das zwecklos.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003780_QUINTUS<tab>The champion of Eorzea is not so easily cowed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003780_QUINTUS<tab>Das ist schließlich niemand anderes als <var 08 E905 ((die Heldin)) ((der Held)) /var> Eorzeas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003790_QUINTUS<tab>Even if <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> allowed <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var> to be collared, the shock would be no more than an itch. No─if <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> refuses to obey, we will activate the twins' restraints instead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003790_QUINTUS<tab>Wenn <var 08 E905 ((die)) ((der)) /var> auf dumme Gedanken kommt, lasst <var 08 E905 ((ihre)) ((seine)) /var> Freunde leiden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003800_ALPHINAUD<tab>You needn't worry about us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003800_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mach dir um uns keine Sorgen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003810_ALISAIE<tab>We'll forget we're even wearing them soon enough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003810_ALISAIE<tab>Wenn wir erstmal ein paar neue Be<var 16 /var>kannt<var 16 /var>schaften gemacht haben, sind die Dinger schnell vergessen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003820_QUINTUS<tab>Even now, you still... Why go to such lengths? What is it all for?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003820_QUINTUS<tab>Diese Kinder. Euch ist der Ernst der Lage wohl nicht bewusst<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Because even the most bitter adversary may one day see reason.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Man kann lernen, auch bei erbitterten Feinden Gemeinsamkeiten zu finden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>On the coldest, blackest of nights...meager though it may be, we must share the warmth of our fire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>In kalten Zeiten muss man erst recht ein warmes Feuer teilen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003830_QUINTUS<tab>You are a curious one. A far cry from the merciless barbarian others paint you to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003830_QUINTUS<tab><var 08 E905 ((Eine wilde Schlächterin)) ((Ein wilder Schlächter)) /var>, <var 08 E905 ((die)) ((der)) /var> Träumen hinterherjagt. Das verstehe, wer will<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003840_QUINTUS<tab>You will be their warden. Take them away.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003840_QUINTUS<tab>Sorge dafür, dass sie sich ordentlich benehmen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003850_JULLUS<tab>Yes sir!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003850_JULLUS<tab>Zu Befehl!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003860_THANCRED<tab>Finally escaped the watchful gaze of your keepers, have we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003860_THANCRED<tab>Endlich bist du deinen Wachhund los. Und? Alles in Ordnung?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003870_THANCRED<tab>Don't react. You'll only draw attention to yourself. Just carry on as you are and listen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003870_THANCRED<tab>Sieh dich nicht so um, das fällt auf. Hör einfach nur zu. Ich hab dir was zu erzählen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003880_THANCRED<tab>After you left with the Garlean lad, Lucia bade a few of us scouts follow you at a discreet distance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003880_THANCRED<tab>Nachdem ihr Camp Splitterglas mit dem Soldaten verlassen hattet, hat Lucia sich an unsere Späher gewandt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003890_THANCRED<tab>We observed you being led into the station, but decided against venturing inside.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003890_THANCRED<tab>Wir haben uns sofort an euch geheftet und gesehen, wie ihr im Tertium verschwunden seid.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003900_THANCRED<tab>When you emerged some time later, and we saw that the twins were sporting magitek collars, it was clear what had taken place.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003900_THANCRED<tab>Als ihr wieder rauskamt, hab ich bemerkt, dass Alphinaud und Alisaie diese Dinger am Hals tragen. Den Rest konnte ich mir denken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003910_THANCRED<tab>Now, as quietly as you can, tell me everything.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003910_THANCRED<tab>Aber etwas musst du mir noch verraten. Wer ist das da in dem Bahnhof? Und was wollen sie?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003920_THANCRED<tab>The legatus himself, eh? Now there's a surprise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003920_THANCRED<tab>Der Legatus der I. Legion also<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003930_THANCRED<tab>This is also the first I've heard of a plan to join forces with the Xth and storm the Tower of Babil.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003930_THANCRED<tab>Und er will mithilfe der X. Legion den Turm von Babil unter Kontrolle bringen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003940_THANCRED<tab>An interesting development...and perhaps the opportunity we've been waiting for.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003940_THANCRED<tab>Verstehe. Das gibt uns vielleicht etwas Spielraum.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003950_THANCRED<tab>Our comrades back at the camp also received some rather promising news, but it's still too early to get our hopes up.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003950_THANCRED<tab>Unser Korps hat nämlich etwas erfahren, das den Legatus womöglich interessieren könnte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003960_THANCRED<tab>For now, keeping yourselves out of harm's way comes before all else. Whatever demands the Garleans make, indulge them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003960_THANCRED<tab>Für dich hat jetzt die Sicherheit von Alphinaud und Alisaie höchste Priorität. Am besten tut ihr, was man von euch verlangt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003970_THANCRED<tab>With luck, this will all be over soon. Until then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003970_THANCRED<tab>Dann viel Glück und bis später.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003980_JULLUS<tab>They had not gone far.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003980_JULLUS<tab>Da sind wir wieder.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003990_ALISAIE<tab>We searched high and low, but no luck, I'm afraid. I might've guessed you'd be the only one to find anything.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_003990_ALISAIE<tab>... Wir haben überall gesucht, aber nichts gefunden. Wenn einer etwas findet, dann bist du das ja - jedes Mal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004000_JULLUS<tab>I wasn't expecting much to begin with. Eventually, there will be nothing left out here for us to safely salvage.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004000_JULLUS<tab>Ziemlich enttäuschend<var 1D /var>... Bald wird es gar keine Vorräte geben, die wir sicher bergen können.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004010_JULLUS<tab>For now, this will have to suffice. We should return to the station.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004010_JULLUS<tab>Das war's für heute. Kehren wir zurück zum Bahnhof.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004020_COLLEAGUESOLDIER<tab>Ah, there you are. Heard you'd gone hunting for ceruleum above ground.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004020_COLLEAGUESOLDIER<tab>Willkommen zurück. Ich hab schon gehört, dass man euch losgeschickt hat, um nach Erdseim zu suchen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004030_COLLEAGUESOLDIER<tab>Brought back a king's ransom?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004030_COLLEAGUESOLDIER<tab>Und? Welchen gefunden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004040_JULLUS<tab>Hardly. But thanks to these three, we have enough to last a little while longer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004040_JULLUS<tab>Etwas. Aber ohne ihre Hilfe wäre es deutlich weniger gewesen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004050_COLLEAGUESOLDIER<tab>Well, well. It's not at all what I was expecting, these ones. For savages, they seem positively docile.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004050_COLLEAGUESOLDIER<tab>Man erzählt sich ja allerhand über die Wilden, aber sie sehen eigentlich ganz gesittet aus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004060_COLLEAGUESOLDIER<tab>Ah, it's a poor attempt at humor. In all honesty, I'm grateful for your efforts. But even with another night of warmth, there are those among us who may not live to see the morrow...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004060_COLLEAGUESOLDIER<tab>Na gut. Jedes bisschen hilft, uns warm zu halten. Ehrlich gesagt bin ich mir nicht sicher, wie wir die Nacht überstehen sollen. Jetzt, wo die auch da sind.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004070_QUINTUS<tab>I trust your expedition was fruitful.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004070_QUINTUS<tab>(-???-)Und? Habt ihr Erdseim gefunden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004080_JULLUS<tab>Lord Quintus!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004080_JULLUS<tab>Legatus Quintus!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004090_QUINTUS<tab>Use what you procured to refuel the armor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004090_QUINTUS<tab>Wenn ja, dann bring ihn gleich zu den Kampf<var 16 /var>maschinen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004100_JULLUS<tab>But sir, what about the heaters for the camp?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004100_JULLUS<tab>Aber damit wollten wir doch den Stützpunkt wärmen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004110_QUINTUS<tab>The time for action is upon us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004110_QUINTUS<tab>Die Pläne haben sich geändert.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004120_QUINTUS<tab>My men and I have matters to discuss. In the meantime, you are to wait here. Do not forget─you are being watched.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004120_QUINTUS<tab>Wir haben jetzt ein paar Dinge zu besprechen. Aber vergesst nicht, dass wir euch im Auge haben. Bleibt, wo ihr seid.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004130_ALISAIE<tab>“The time for action”... What did he mean by that?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004130_ALISAIE<tab>Was für Pläne meint er wohl?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004140_ALPHINAUD<tab>I can only speculate. Clearly something requiring their magitek, given what we just heard. Whether they plan to utilize it now or after they join with the Xth is another question...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Keine Ahnung<var 1D /var>... Aber offensichtlich will er die Magitek-Maschinen bereitmachen. Die Frage ist, ob er sie jetzt einsetzen will oder erst, wenn er sich mit der X. Legion zusammengetan hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004150_ALPHINAUD<tab>Will they ever escape this cold? Return to and reclaim the idyllic spaces of which Jullus spoke...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004150_ALPHINAUD<tab>Er muss seine Leute aus der Kälte schaffen. In eine Stadt oder in wärmere Gefilde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004160_ALISAIE<tab>Finished your war council?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004160_ALISAIE<tab>Und? Was habt ihr besprochen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004170_JULLUS<tab>Alphinaud and Alisaie are to stay here...as our prisoners. They will be released once your comrades have relinquished their supplies and withdrawn from Garlean soil.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004170_JULLUS<tab>Dein Bruder und du verbleiben als Geiseln, um das Korps zu zwingen, Material zu überstellen und sich zurückzuziehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004180_JULLUS<tab>Until our terms are met, they will be detained at a separate location.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004180_JULLUS<tab>Bis zur Übergabe werdet ihr an einen anderen Ort gebracht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004190_ALISAIE<tab>After everything we've said and done, this is how you treat us!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004190_ALISAIE<tab>Was soll denn das!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Our allies have but limited supplies. They may stave off cold and starvation for a short while, but what then!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004200_ALPHINAUD<tab>So viel Material hat das Korps auch nicht. Weit werdet ihr damit nicht kommen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004210_THANCRED<tab>For now, keeping yourselves out of harm's way comes before all else. Whatever demands the Garleans make, indulge them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004210_THANCRED<tab>Für dich hat jetzt die Sicherheit von Alphinaud und Alisaie höchste Priorität. Am besten tut ihr, was man von euch verlangt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Do as he says.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wir tun, was sie sagen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Everything will be all right. Have faith.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wir müssen an uns glauben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004220_JULLUS<tab>Get them out of here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004220_JULLUS<tab>Führt sie ab.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004230_JULLUS<tab>This is my home. <var 1A 02 /var>Our<var 1A 01 /var> home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004230_JULLUS<tab>Hier habe ich gewohnt. Mit meiner Familie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004240_JULLUS<tab>Least it was until that night. I was with Lord Quintus when the capital fell, and thus spared. My family, who did not own a radio, were less fortunate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004240_JULLUS<tab>Ich blieb verschont, weil ich bei Quintus war. Aber meine Eltern hatten kein Radio, das sie beschützen konnte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004250_JULLUS<tab>When dawn came, I made my way here. My parents...my little brother and sister...they were still inside...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004250_JULLUS<tab>Am nächsten Morgen bin ich sofort nach Hause gerannt. Meine Eltern und meine Geschwister waren noch da<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004260_JULLUS<tab>But they weren't themselves, and they...they tried to... And I had to...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004260_JULLUS<tab>Aber es war zu spät. Als ich sie ansprach, fielen sie über mich her. Und ich<var 1D /var>... ich musste<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004270_JULLUS<tab>I'd promised to take them away from the capital that very morning. To somewhere safe, to hide until the fighting stopped.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004270_JULLUS<tab>Eigentlich wollten sie an diesem Morgen alle die Stadt verlassen. Sie hatten mir versprochen, sich in Sicherheit zu bringen, bis dieser wahnsinnige Bürgerkrieg zu Ende sei<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004280_JULLUS<tab>I promised...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004280_JULLUS<tab>Aber dann<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004290_JULLUS<tab>The Garlean flag bears a chain. The bonds between our countrymen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004290_JULLUS<tab>Die Kette auf der Flagge des Kaiserreiches steht für den untrennbaren Zusammenhalt zwischen seinen Bürgern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004300_JULLUS<tab>A red link at its center─the blood of the fallen. Our loved ones who lived and died for Garlemald.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004300_JULLUS<tab>Das rote Glied steht für die, die für unser Land gestorben sind. Denn sie sind auch ein Teil von Garlemald.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004310_JULLUS<tab>But if she, too, fell, who would be left to remember them and their sacrifice? What enduring proof would there be that they were ever here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004310_JULLUS<tab>Doch wo bleibt die Erinnerung an sie, wenn das Reich untergeht?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004320_JULLUS<tab>If we had turned to your gods, would they have saved us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004320_JULLUS<tab>Geben euch eure Gebete darauf eine Antwort?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004330_JULLUS<tab>I'm sorry. Forget I spoke.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004330_JULLUS<tab>Entschuldige.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004340_JULLUS<tab>We should go.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004340_JULLUS<tab>Jetzt ist aber genug Zeit vertan. Gehen wir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004350_ALISAIE<tab>It's no use.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004350_ALISAIE<tab>Hier kommen wir nicht raus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004360_ALPHINAUD<tab>Believe me, I do not enjoy being here any more than you. But he wanted us to play along, so that is what we will do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004360_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich weiß, es nervt, aber wir können nur hier sitzen und abwarten. Wie er gesagt hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004370_ALPHINAUD<tab>Believe me, I do not enjoy being here any more than you. But she wanted us to play along, so that is what we will do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004370_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich weiß, es nervt, aber wir können nur hier sitzen und abwarten. Wie sie gesagt hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004380_ALISAIE<tab>...It's so cold.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004380_ALISAIE<tab>Mir ist kalt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004390_ALPHINAUD<tab>Painfully so... Unbearably.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004390_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ja<var 1D /var>... Die Kälte kriecht mir schon ins Gemüt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004400_ALISAIE<tab>I've been thinking about what Quintus said. About why no one would accept Garlean rule.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004400_ALISAIE<tab>Ich hab darüber nachgedacht, was Quintus uns gefragt hat. Warum wir die garleische Herrschaft nicht einfach anerkannt haben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004410_ALISAIE<tab>Irreconcilable differences. When coexistence isn't an option, only conquest remains.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004410_ALISAIE<tab>Er sagte, dass wir uns womöglich zu sehr unterscheiden. Und dass sich davor niemand mehr gefürchtet hätte, als die Garlear selbst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004420_ALISAIE<tab>Varis at Ghimlyt said much the same. Only by uniting the world beneath a single standard would we rid ourselves of the Ascians.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004420_ALISAIE<tab>Varis hat uns während der Verhandlung in Ghimlyt gesagt, dass er die Völker unter das garleische Banner zwingt, um die Ascians zu besiegen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004430_ALISAIE<tab>United...as one people. One race, cleansed of “imperfections.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004430_ALISAIE<tab>Er wollte die Stärken und Schwächen, die uns ausmachen, beseitigen. Er wollte die Unterschiede zwischen den Völkern beseitigen, vielleicht, weil sie sonst nicht zusammen am gleichen Strang ziehen können.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004440_ALISAIE<tab>A cold and unforgiving vision. And when we fail to live up to their standards...what place is there for us in their world?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004440_ALISAIE<tab>In seiner Welt wäre kein Platz für diejenigen, die zu schwach sind oder sonst wie nicht in seinen großartigen Plan passen. Was für ein trauriger Gedanke.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004450_ALISAIE<tab>But the truly sad, truly <var 1A 02 /var>frustrating<var 1A 01 /var> thing is how damnably similar it all is to the lofty ideals of Father and the Forum.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004450_ALISAIE<tab>Erinner dich mal an unseren Vater<var 1D /var>... Wie wütend ihn diese Art von Ablehnung gemacht hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004460_ALISAIE<tab>Nonintervention─always nonintervention. Protect our knowledge and our people and to hells with the rest of you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004460_ALISAIE<tab>Aber was haben er und der Rat unternommen? Sie haben Augen und Ohren verschlossen und die Welt ihrem Schicksal überlassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004470_ALISAIE<tab>And yet...I can see how it happened. Varis and Father looked to their elders for guidance and took their virtues as their own. For this world was of their making─in who else could they place their trust?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004470_ALISAIE<tab>Diese Welt wurde nicht von uns gemacht, sondern von Männern, die nur an ihre eigenen Ideale gedacht haben. Das gilt für Varis genauso wie für unseren Vater.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004480_ALISAIE<tab>All of us lost in a sea of chaos, searching desperately for purpose and meaning...but it shouldn't just be an extension of another's. It has to be ours. It has to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004480_ALISAIE<tab>Wir haben die Chance, es anders zu machen. Wir müssen eine Welt schaffen, die für alle lebenswert ist. Ich meine damit wirklich alle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004490_ALISAIE<tab>We all have a stake in this world. No one should be silenced...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004490_ALISAIE<tab>Ich will mir einfach nichts mehr vorschreiben lassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004500_ALPHINAUD<tab>I won't deny that we lack the experience of people such as Father or Quintus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004500_ALPHINAUD<tab>Vater hat viel erlebt. Und auch Quintus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004510_ALPHINAUD<tab>Perhaps they've come to see the world as a series of problems, and the most efficient way of solving them to reduce everything to fundamental forms.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004510_ALPHINAUD<tab>Sie haben Kriege gefochten und in ihrem Leben eine Krise nach der anderen bewältigt. Dabei haben sie sich gewisse Denkweisen angeeignet - Schubladen in ihren Köpfen, um die komplizierte Welt etwas einfacher zu machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004520_ALPHINAUD<tab>A stone is a stone, a cloud a cloud, a flower no more than that. Simple descriptions that strip the subject of distinguishing characteristics.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Für sie ist ein Tier ein Tier, und eine Blume ist eine Blume. Sie vergessen manchmal, wie endlos viele Unterschiede es auf der Welt gibt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004530_ALPHINAUD<tab>A man is a man. Divided according to race, creed, or allegiance─and to some, defined by such associations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mit den Bewohnern dieses Planeten ist es ähnlich: Wir kennen die Völker und ihre Flaggen, aber man vergisst, wie viel Diversität dahinter steckt. Und dass wir uns in unserer Vielfältigkeit im Grunde doch sehr ähnlich sind.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004540_ALISAIE<tab>Is that what <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> think?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004540_ALISAIE<tab>Glaubst du das auch?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004550_ALPHINAUD<tab>In my misbegotten youth. But what I believed wisdom was no more than aggressive ignorance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004550_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich kann nicht sagen, dass ich ganz frei bin von so einer Denkweise. Ich denke heute noch oft, ich hätte die Dinge durchschaut und der Weisheit letzten Schluss bereits gefunden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004560_ALPHINAUD<tab>I've since learned to look beyond the banners and the politics. To see people as individuals with their own hopes and dreams.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004560_ALPHINAUD<tab>Aber ich weiß jetzt, dass ich genauer hinsehen muss, unter die Oberfläche. Jede Person ist einzigartig, mit eigenen Hoffnungen und Träumen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004570_ALPHINAUD<tab>As for my dream of building a better world... Well, every day I am reminded that it is far more complex than I had ever imagined.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004570_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mein Traum ist es, die Welt zu retten. Mir ist jetzt klar, dass das viel schwieriger ist, als ich dachte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004580_ALPHINAUD<tab>But it only spurs me onward. To find the wisdom and the strength to see it through to the very end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004580_ALPHINAUD<tab>Aber ich weiß auch, dass ich die Kraft habe, meinen Traum zu verwirklichen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004590_LUCIA<tab>All of our supplies and an immediate withdrawal? These are your conditions?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004590_LUCIA<tab>Die gesamten Vorräte und unser unverzüglicher Rückzug? Das ist eine gewaltige Forderung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004600_JULLUS<tab>Demands. And you forgot about the airship.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004600_JULLUS<tab>Das sind unsere Bedingungen. Außerdem habt ihr ein Luftschiff zurückzulassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004610_JULLUS<tab>Once again, you will leave one behind. It will be used to return the prisoners. Their collars will be removed prior to the exchange.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004610_JULLUS<tab>Damit die Geiseln heimkehren können. Die Halszwingen werden natürlich vorher entfernt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004620_ALISAIE<tab>So in the end, not even Father's expertly worded rhetoric could deter you from your chosen course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004620_ALISAIE<tab>Wir wollen also beide die Welt verändern. Dagegen kommt nicht einmal Vater mit seinen schlauen Worten an.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004630_ALPHINAUD<tab>Huh?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004630_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wie meinst du das?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004640_ALISAIE<tab>Not that I thought for a moment that it would. I've no love for violence, of course, but ours is a cause worth fighting for. I just wish he'd realize it too.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004640_ALISAIE<tab>Wir kämpfen für das Richtige. Ich wünsche mir nur, dass Vater das auch so sehen würde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004650_ALISAIE<tab>Sometimes the only way to protect the ones you love is to take a stand. To refuse to suffer in silence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004650_ALISAIE<tab>Manchmal muss man eben kämpfen, wenn man die beschützen möchte, die man liebt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004660_ALISAIE<tab>I want you to know I share your conviction. Whether it be on the battlefield or in the debating chamber, I won't back down. I guess what I'm saying is...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004660_ALISAIE<tab>Ich will nicht sagen, dass man sofort zu Schwert und Zauber greifen muss. Ich bin ja auch für Frieden. Aber<var 1D /var>... Was ich wirklich will, ist<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004670_ALPHINAUD<tab>You've found your own reason to fight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004670_ALPHINAUD<tab>Du willst eine Welt, die für alle lebenswert ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004680_ALISAIE<tab>Yes. Yes, I have.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004680_ALISAIE<tab>Ja. Das ist es.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004690_ALISAIE<tab>Gods willing, there will come a day when we can finally lay down our arms, and there will be peace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004690_ALISAIE<tab>Zusammen werden wir schon einen Weg finden, wie wir die Welt wieder ins Lot bekommen. Und dann, irgendwann, wenn die Götter es so wollen, werden wir unsere Klingen und Zauberbücher beiseitelegen und den Frieden genießen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004700_ALISAIE<tab>But not until the Telophoroi have been defeated once and for all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004700_ALISAIE<tab>Vorher müssen wir aber noch die Telophoroi besiegen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004710_ALISAIE<tab>And you, Brother, will have a vital part to play. By your words and deeds, you'll lead the way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004710_ALISAIE<tab>Und du, du wirst uns zum Sieg führen, Alphinaud.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004720_ALPHINAUD<tab>...I pray I am up to the task.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004720_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich werde es versuchen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004730_ALISAIE<tab>There'll always be naysayers. Those who think us fools for even trying.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004730_ALISAIE<tab>Es wird immer welche geben, die sagen, dass es keinen Sinn hat, zu kämpfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004740_ALISAIE<tab>It's easy for learned elites to criticize earnest efforts and assert their moral superiority. All without offering alternatives.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004740_ALISAIE<tab>Aber es ist leicht, gegen etwas zu sein, und dabei klug auszusehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004750_ALISAIE<tab>Not that their sophistry has ever wounded you. So stubborn and strong─stronger than you even know.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004750_ALISAIE<tab>Du weißt das. Du hast oft genug im Gegenwind gestanden. Und doch gibst du niemals auf, weil du so stark bist. Stärker, als du glaubst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004760_ALISAIE<tab>Don't ever change, you hear me? If you stumble, I'll be there to catch you. Or give you a thick ear. Maybe both for good measure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004760_ALISAIE<tab>Hab Mut und gehe deinen Weg. Und wenn du mal davon abkommst, hast du ja immer noch mich, um dir zu zeigen, wo es langgeht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004770_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you, Alisaie...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004770_ALPHINAUD<tab>Danke, Alisaie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004780_MAXIMA<tab>The scouts have secured Alisaie and Alphinaud. Their collars were removed without complication as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004780_MAXIMA<tab>Die Späher haben Alisaie und Alphinaud. Die Halszwingen konnten sie auch sicher entfernen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004790_MAXIMA<tab>They report no casualties─not for their party nor the guards, who will wake from their premature slumber in due course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004790_MAXIMA<tab>Es sind keine Verluste zu beklagen. Auch nicht bei den Wachen: Sie wurden in tiefen Schlaf versetzt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004800_LUCIA<tab>It would appear the situation has changed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004800_LUCIA<tab>Sieht so aus, als hätte sich das Blatt gewendet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004810_LUCIA<tab>I propose new terms. We have information that will be of great interest to Lord Quintus, and I wish to speak with him in person.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004810_LUCIA<tab>Ich schlage vor, dass wir unsere Gespräche von Neuem beginnen. Wir haben gewisse Informationen, die von großem Interesse für Legatus Quintus wären.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004820_JULLUS<tab>No. In the event you rejected our first proposal, we came prepared with a second.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004820_JULLUS<tab>Es ist einerlei. Wir haben unsere Befehle für den Fall, dass die Ver<var 16 /var>hand<var 16 /var>lungen scheitern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004830_LUCIA<tab>Ambush!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004830_LUCIA<tab>Ein Hinterhalt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004840_CIRINA<tab>More are coming! Make ready!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004840_CIRINA<tab>Da kommen noch mehr!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004850_JULLUS<tab>We, the loyal soldiers of the Ist Legion, proud servants of Garlemald...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004850_JULLUS<tab>Wir, die I. Kaiserliche Legion, treue Diener des garleischen Reiches<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004860_JULLUS<tab>Of the fallen Emperor Varis, shall safeguard these lands...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004860_JULLUS<tab>... schwören, die kaiserlichen Länder zu schützen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004870_JULLUS<tab>...from the barbarian hordes until our countrymen return!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004870_JULLUS<tab>... bis unsere Kameraden zurückkehren, und sei es mit unseren Leben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004880_LUCIA<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004880_LUCIA<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004890_ARUHNSENNA<tab>Stop, both of you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004890_ARUHNSENNA<tab>Aufhören!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004900_JULLUS<tab> Report if displayed
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004900_JULLUS<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004910_ARUHNSENNA<tab>This child may be the worst emissary I have ever seen...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004910_ARUHNSENNA<tab>Was macht dieser Dummkopf in einer diplomatischen Delegation?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004920_LUCIA<tab>We received an urgent communication from the Grand Company of Eorzea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004920_LUCIA<tab>Die Eorzäische Föderation hat soeben eine wichtige Nachricht übermittelt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004930_LUCIA<tab>Envoys from the imperial army, led by members of the Xth Legion, came to Ala Mhigo and requested an audience.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004930_LUCIA<tab>Vertreter der garleischen Armee, zum größten Teil Mitglieder der X. Legion, sind in Ala Mhigo eingetroffen und bitten darum, gehört zu werden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004940_LUCIA<tab>They explained that their efforts to coordinate the reclamation of the capital with the aid of the IVth, Vth, VIIIth, and XIIth had ended in failure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004940_LUCIA<tab>Offenbar sind ihre Versuche gescheitert, die Hauptstadt mithilfe der IV., V., VIII. und XII. Legion zurück<var 16 /var>zu<var 16 /var>erobern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004950_LUCIA<tab>Communication between most legions has broken down entirely. Most of the Xth's conscripts have deserted, leaving their forces severely depleted.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004950_LUCIA<tab>Die Legionen sprechen kaum noch miteinander. Und da die meisten ihrer Soldaten desertiert sind, ist die X. Legion nicht länger einsatzbereit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004960_LUCIA<tab>That is why, unable to continue the fight on their own, they and their allies turned to the Grand Company of Eorzea for aid.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004960_LUCIA<tab>Deswegen haben ihre Anführer beschlossen, sich an die Föderation zu wenden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004970_JULLUS<tab>Lies! Every word!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004970_JULLUS<tab>Lügen! Das sind nichts als Lügen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004980_LUCIA<tab>It is the truth, and I have not finished. The Xth has requested that we deliver a message to Lord Quintus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004980_LUCIA<tab>Es ist die Wahrheit, und es kommt noch mehr. Die X. Legion bittet uns, Legatus Quintus eine Nachricht zu überbringen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004990_LUCIA<tab>“Have the iyl stand down.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_004990_LUCIA<tab>Die iyl sollen zurückfallen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005000_JULLUS<tab>You have been listening, my lord?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005000_JULLUS<tab>Habt Ihr das gehört, Legatus Quintus?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005010_JULLUS<tab>Wh-What are your orders?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005010_JULLUS<tab>Wie lauten Eure Befehle?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005020_QUINTUS<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005020_QUINTUS<tab>Haaa<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005030_QUINTUS<tab>Inform her...that we will honor the Xth's decision.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005030_QUINTUS<tab>Sag ihnen, dass wir die Entscheidung der X. Legion akzeptieren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005040_QUINTUS<tab>Bereft of hope...and now dignity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005040_QUINTUS<tab>Die Schlinge zieht sich zu, langsam, aber sicher<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005050_QUINTUS<tab>I release you from your duty. All of you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005050_QUINTUS<tab>Geht. Ich entbinde euch eurer Pflichten. Das gilt für alle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005060_QUINTUS<tab>I take solace, Your Radiance, in the knowledge you are not here to witness our debasement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005060_QUINTUS<tab>Kaiser Varis<var 1D /var>... Wie sehr muss es Euch schmerzen, Euer Land so gedemütigt zu sehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005070_QUINTUS<tab>'Twas a grand, glorious dream we shared.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005070_QUINTUS<tab>Erinnert Ihr Euch noch an unseren Traum?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005080_QUINTUS<tab>Of a world united. Of peace and prosperity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005080_QUINTUS<tab>Wir sahen eine Zukunft, in der die Welt unter einem Banner vereint ist. In Frieden und Wohlstand.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005090_QUINTUS<tab>We are ghosts, you and I. Memories of days gone by.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005090_QUINTUS<tab>Und nun<var 1D /var>... sind wir nicht mehr als flüchtige Gespenster, aus einer vergangenen Zeit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005100_QUINTUS<tab>Bonds forged in blood...that I will not see tarnished.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005100_QUINTUS<tab>Doch wahre Treue überdauert auch den Tod.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005110_ALISAIE<tab>Quickly! We have to reach the station before it's too late!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005110_ALISAIE<tab>Schnell! Zum Tertium, bevor es zu spät ist!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005120_ALPHINAUD<tab>If there is still a chance that Quintus will agree to a truce, we must take it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005120_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wenn Quintus irgendwie zu einem Waffenstillstand zu bewegen ist, müssen wir es versuchen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005130_ALISAIE<tab>I just hope we get there before he and his men do something rash...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005130_ALISAIE<tab>Hoffentlich hört er uns auch zu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005140_ALISAIE<tab>Is that all of them?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005140_ALISAIE<tab>Sind das die letzten?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005150_ALPHINAUD<tab>The last of those who agreed to join us, yes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005150_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ja, das sind alle, die sich uns anschließen wollen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005160_THANCRED<tab>We left heaters and provisions for those who wished to stay behind. They won't last forever, but hopefully they'll last long enough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005160_THANCRED<tab>Die anderen haben wir mit Öfen und Nahrungsmitteln versorgt. Damit werden sie sich eine Weile durchbeißen können.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005170_ALISAIE<tab>For now, I think everyone's earned a rest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005170_ALISAIE<tab>Das ist gut zu hören.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005180_ALISAIE<tab>We'll see to those in need of medical attention, so take the others with you and get yourselves some hot soup.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005180_ALISAIE<tab>Um die Verletzten kümmern wir uns hier. Die anderen können sich weiter hinten bei einer warmen Mahlzeit aufwärmen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005190_JULLUS<tab>Warmth, at last...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005190_JULLUS<tab>Endlich etwas Wärme<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005200_EMMANELLAIN<tab>Marvelous, isn't it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005200_EMMANELLAIN<tab>Gemütlich, nicht wahr?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005210_EMMANELLAIN<tab>All thanks to the resourceful machinists of Ishgard, I might add. On their behalf, I bid you warm yourself to your heart's content!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005210_EMMANELLAIN<tab>Diese wohlige Wärme hast du übrigens den schlauen Maschinisten Ishgards zu verdanken. Genieße sie!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005220_SICARD<tab>Hold on. Your people might've scribbled a few things on a piece of parchment, but it was our Lominsan smiths that put the bloody things together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005220_SICARD<tab>Hm? Ihr habt vielleicht die Baupläne gezeichnet, aber gebaut haben diese Öfen die Schmiede von Limsa Lominsa!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005230_EMMANELLAIN<tab>Well, be that as it may...we single-handedly got the interior heating up and running again, didn't we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005230_EMMANELLAIN<tab>Jetzt spalte mal keine Haare. Fakt ist: Es ist warm, weil <var 1A 02 /var>wir<var 1A 01 /var> die Schlausten sind!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005240_SICARD<tab>The hells you did! We were there every step of the way!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005240_SICARD<tab>Schlau? Wenn du schlau wärst, würdest du jetzt deinen Mund halten! <var 1A 02 /var>Wir<var 1A 01 /var> haben die Öfen gebaut!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005250_EMMANELLAIN<tab>“We”!? You barely raised a finger to help, you ale-sodden reprobate!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005250_EMMANELLAIN<tab>„Wir“? Du kannst doch einen Hammer nicht von einem Amboss unterscheiden!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005260_SICARD<tab>I did a damn sight more than you, you lily-livered bilge rat!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005260_SICARD<tab>Was erlaubst du dir, du eingebildeter Schnösel!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005270_EMMANELLAIN<tab>Take that back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005270_EMMANELLAIN<tab>Nimm das zurück!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005280_SICARD<tab>Make me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005280_SICARD<tab>Lieber sterb ich!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005290_EMMANELLAIN<tab>I will not stoop to your level!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005290_EMMANELLAIN<tab>Den Gefallen tu ich dir nicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005300_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION<tab>Here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005300_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION<tab>Hier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005310_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION<tab>At ease, man. There's nothing funny in it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005310_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION<tab>Iss schon. Das wird dich nicht umbringen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005320_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION<tab>I'm from Ala Mhigo, but was a conscript until recently. Used to eat this with the officers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005320_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION<tab>Ich bin aus Ala Mhigo, wurde aber in die Legion eingezogen. Da haben wir das immer mit den garleischen Offizieren gegessen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005330_ULDAHNDELEGATION<tab>Apparently, it's adapted from a Steppe recipe. This is my first time trying it, and I have to say it's not half bad.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005330_ULDAHNDELEGATION<tab>Das Rezept für diese Suppe stammt ursprünglich von den Hirten der Azim-Steppe. Sie schmeckt besser, als sie aussieht - und sie wärmt den Magen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005340_GRIDANIANDELEGATION<tab>Hmm... It's a bit too flavorful for my liking...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005340_GRIDANIANDELEGATION<tab>Hmm<var 1D /var>... Ist 'n bisschen zu deftig für meinen Geschmack.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005350_ULDAHNDELEGATION<tab>Perhaps compared to what you're used to.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005350_ULDAHNDELEGATION<tab>Bei euch isst man ja auch nur Kräuterblätter und Wurzeln.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005360_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION<tab>It's the little things that make life worth living, don't you think?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005360_ALAMHIGANDELEGATION<tab>Es sind die kleinen Dinge, die das Leben lebenswert machen, stimmt's?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005370_JULLUS<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005370_JULLUS<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005380_LUCIA<tab>I know this is not a dream, and yet...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005380_LUCIA<tab>Es ist, als würde man träumen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005390_LUCIA<tab>I felt the same way at the Dragonsong War's end. Every morning I would step outside and need to be reminded that it wasn't my imagination. That my world had been forever changed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005390_LUCIA<tab>Damals, als der Drachenkrieg endlich vorbei war, habe ich mich genauso gefühlt. Jeden Morgen sah ich diese neue, friedliche Welt und fragte mich, ob ich mir das alles nur einbilde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005400_LUCIA<tab>And just as I had I grown accustomed to the idea, again you change my world in ways I never thought possible.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005400_LUCIA<tab>Und kaum habe ich mich daran gewöhnt, da erfüllst du uns einen weiteren Traum.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005410_LUCIA<tab>Were it not for you and your fellow Scions, the rifts between man and dragon and myriad tribes might never have been bridged.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005410_LUCIA<tab>Ohne dich und den Bund der Morgenröte wäre das alles nicht möglich gewesen<var 1D /var>... Ishgarder und Drachen, aber auch die vielen anderen Völker dieses Gestirns, wären sich niemals nähergekommen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005420_LUCIA<tab>The Grand Company of Eorzea, the Ilsabard contingent... We owe it all to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005420_LUCIA<tab>Die Eorzäische Föderation, das Ilsabard-Korps<var 1D /var>... all das hätte es nie gegeben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005430_LUCIA<tab>We've shed many tears in recent days. Of pain and sorrow. Triumph and joy. I much prefer the latter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005430_LUCIA<tab>Es sind viele Tränen geflossen. Wir werden alles dafür tun, dass es keine Tränen der Reue sind.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>As do I.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich werde helfen, wo ich kann.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We often don't have the luxury of choice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Das wird nicht leicht werden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005440_LUCIA<tab>I am honored to fight by your side. As an Eorzean and Garlean both, I shall do all in my power to bring my peoples together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005440_LUCIA<tab>Danke. Ich fühle mich zu gleichen Teilen als Eorzäerin wie auch Garlearin. Ich verspreche alles zu tun, um die Kluft zwischen den beiden Völkern zu verkleinern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005450_LUCIA<tab>Indeed. We can but do our utmost to unite these disparate peoples and lead them to victory.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005450_LUCIA<tab>Das stimmt. Ich werde alles tun, um die Mitglieder des Korps zu einer Einheit zu schweißen und uns zum Sieg zu führen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06001_005460_MAXIMA<tab>It is a remarkable achievement─everything that I and the Populares had hoped for and more.
